__e: Meanwhile, Nurse Gilbert has had her full eight hours.
Gilbert Novatny's game ticket was purchased by a local sports talk radio station.
Your husband is the one who helped jon Gilbert execute his idiot plan in the first place!
And then Gilbert's brother and his uncle, and then...
So I'm going to take a page from the Elena Gilbert handbook and choose to believe that you can be saved.

Look, I don't wanna be a hard-on about this, and I know it wasn't your fault, but I just thought it was fair to tell you that Gilbert and I will be submitting this to the league and asking them to set aside the round.
